Audio.Author: Bruno Arantes de Andrade Bueno
Audio.Comments: HPF 500 Hz. Bird was perched on a small tree 3m off the groud, in open disturbed cerrado area. Note its fast wing beats at 03:15 when bird flies away.bird-seen:yesplayback-used:no
